casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ryan Lamar PARSONS 320P17-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Ms. Kimberly N. Callahan, Raleigh, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Ryan Lamar Parsons, for Parsons, Ryan Lamar Ms. Lorraine B. Lewis, Pro Se/Power of Attorney obo Parsons, for Parsons, Ryan Lamar Mr. J. Douglas Henderson, Greensboro, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of February 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
